name: Ice Cream Milkshake Smoothie Dessert Drink Maker
name_original: Ice Cream Milkshake Smoothie Dessert Drink Maker
description:
Craving for a delicious milkshake? Then this is the game for you! Milkshake Smoothie Maker - Frozen Dessert Food Creation is exactly what it sounds like, a delicious milkshake maker! Create your unique dessert smoothie with dozens of unique decorations and flavors!

FEATURES:
-Many flavors to choose! From Banana to Keylime Pie and Fudge Brownie!!
-Unique decorations to choose from for your milkshake glass!
-Fun and cool straws to use!

Remember to save your creations and share it with your friends!

NOTE: This app is free to play but also offers in-app purchases to remove ads from gameplay.
